List<JBCXM__C360Sections__c> c360SecList = [SELECT Id, Name, JBCXM__InCustomer360__c FROM JBCXM__C360Sections__c WHERE Name = 'AccountAttributes'];
JBCXM__C360Sections__c c360Sec = c360SecList.get(0);
c360Sec.JBCXM__IsActive__c = true;
c360Sec.JBCXM__InCustomer360__c = true;
update c360Sec;
DELETE [SELECT Id FROM JBCXM__UIViews__c WHERE JBCXM__UITabName__c = 'Customer360'];
